staticContentModule.title: Start page
staticContentModule.description: Welcome to the online chess and checkers simulator.

staticContentModule.title: Rankings
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to check the players' ranking positions.

staticContentModule.title: About application
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to find more about this application.

staticContentModule.title: Contact with us
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to send message via form.

staticContentModule.title: Game rules
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to find more about game rules in this application.

staticContentModule.title: Report a bug
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to report a bug in application via form.

staticContentModule.title: Newsletter
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to manage your newsletter.

staticContentModule.title: Unsubscribe newsletter
staticContentModule.description: Redirect page to unsubscribe newsletter via link from email message.

staticContentModule.title: Privacy Policy
staticContentModule.description: On this page you have the opportunity to check and read privacy policy.

authRegisterModule.title: Log in
authRegisterModule.description: To make full use of the application, log in to the account you have created.

authRegisterModule.title: Sign up
authRegisterModule.description: To use the full capabilities of the app create a free account.

authRegisterModule.title: Forgot Password
authRegisterModule.description: In this page you have the opportunity to restore forgotten account password.

authRegisterModule.title: Activate Account
authRegisterModule.description: On this page you can activate your account.
